verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall encamp <S%H2583><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> by his own standard <S%H1714><s%>, with the ensigns <S%H226><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>: over against <S%H5048><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> shall they encamp <S%H2583><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And those that encamp <S%H2583><s%> on the east side <S%H6924><s%> toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%> shall be they of the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, according to their hosts <S%H6635><s%>: and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall be Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab <S%H5992><s%>.
And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H7657><s%>, were threescore and fourteen thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And those that encamp <S%H2583><s%> next unto him shall be the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>: and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the <S%H1121><s%> children of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> shall be Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar <S%H6686><s%>.
And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> thereof <S%H2572><s%>, were fifty and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>: and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> shall be Eliab <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Helon <S%H2497><s%>.
And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> thereof <S%H2572><s%>, were fifty and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

All that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> were a hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and fourscore <S%H8084><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, according to their hosts <S%H6635><s%>. They shall set forth <S%H5265><s%> first <S%H7223><s%>.

On the south side <S%H8486><s%> shall be the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> according to their hosts <S%H6635><s%>: and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> shall be Elizur <S%H468><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shedeur <S%H7707><s%>.
And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> thereof <S%H705><s%>, were forty and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And those that encamp <S%H2583><s%> next unto him shall be the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>: and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> shall be Shelumiel <S%H8017><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zurishaddai <S%H6701><s%>.
And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H2572><s%>, were fifty and nine <S%H8672><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>: and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> shall be Eliasaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel <S%H7467><s%>.

And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H705><s%>, were forty and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>.

All that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> were a hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>, according to their hosts <S%H6635><s%>. And they shall set forth <S%H5265><s%> second <S%H8145><s%>.

Then the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> shall set forward <S%H5265><s%>, with the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the camps <S%H4264><s%>: as they encamp <S%H2583><s%>, so shall they set forward <S%H5265><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> in his place <S%H3027><s%>, by their standards <S%H1714><s%>.

On the west side <S%H3220><s%> shall be the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> according to their hosts <S%H6635><s%>: and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall be Elishama <S%H476><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud <S%H5989><s%>.
And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H705><s%>, were forty thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And next unto him shall be the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>: and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> shall be Gamaliel <S%H1583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedahzur <S%H6301><s%>.
And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H7970><s%>, were thirty and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>: and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> shall be Abidan <S%H27><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gideoni <S%H1441><s%>.
And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H7970><s%>, were thirty and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

All that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> were a hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and a hundred <S%H3967><s%>, according to their hosts <S%H6635><s%>. And they shall set <S%H5265><s%> forth third <S%H7992><s%>.

On the north side <S%H6828><s%> shall be the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their hosts <S%H6635><s%>: and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall be Ahiezer <S%H295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammishaddai <S%H5996><s%>.

And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H8346><s%>, were threescore and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And those that encamp <S%H2583><s%> next unto him shall be the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>: and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> shall be Pagiel <S%H6295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ochran <S%H5918><s%>.
And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H705><s%>, were forty and one <S%H259><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>: and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> shall be Ahira <S%H299><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Enan <S%H5881><s%>.
And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H2572><s%>, were fifty and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

All that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> were a hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>. They shall set <S%H5265><s%> forth hindmost <S%H314><s%> by their standards <S%H1714><s%>.

These are they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>: all that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the camps <S%H4264><s%> according to their hosts <S%H6635><s%> were six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>.

But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> were not numbered <S%H6485><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

Thus did <S%H6213><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; according to all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so they encamped <S%H2583><s%> by their standards <S%H1714><s%>, and so they set forward <S%H5265><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%>, according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>.
